Items.Name: Invisibility Implant
Items.Effect: One invention deals double damage to one non Large enemy

Items.Name: Chaos Orb
Items.Effect: Draw an assult invention on this, it counts as you have this invention this turn

Items.Name: Stun Gun
Items.Effect: Ignore one failure effect, but face that enemy next round

Items.Name: Automated Turret
Items.Effect: Deal 1 damage to an enemy

Items.Name: Rock-It Launcher
Items.Effect: Any Resource Arrow Deal 3 damage to an Enemy, it,s doubled against Large enemies

Items.Name: Cyber Virus
Items.Effect: Deal 3 damage to a Computer threat

Items.Name: Sacrificial Plume
Items.Effect: Lose one scientist but destroy one threat

Items.Name: Sticky Grenades
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to an enemy and 1 damage to every other enemy

Items.Name: Smart Hacking Tool
Items.Effect: One Computer threat deals damage equal to it's health to another Threat

Items.Name: Sabotage Multitool
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to a Scheme

Items.Name: Augmented Soldiers
Items.Effect: Deal 1 damage to an enemy, plus 1 if it's Robotic

Items.Name: Robotic Soldiers
Items.Effect: Deal 1 damage to an enemy, plus 1 if it's Magical

Items.Name: Mutants
Items.Effect: Deal 1 damage to an enemy, plus 1 if it's Biological

Items.Name: Poison Armaments
Items.Effect: Take the failure effects of an enemy then double the damage on that enemy

Items.Name: Magic Missle Launcher
Items.Effect: Deal 3 damage divided as you choose to enemies, it's doubled against Large enemies

Items.Name: Surveillance Network
Items.Effect: Deal 1 damage to all Schemes

Items.Name: Death Ray
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to an enemy, plus 2 if it's biological

Items.Name: Lightning Gun
Items.Effect: Choose up to 3 enemies: Deal 3 damage to the first, 2 to the second, 1 to the third

Items.Name: Energy Railgun
Items.Effect: Deal 5 Damage to an enemy

Items.Name: Invisible Lab
Items.Effect: Ignore the failure effect of one enemy

Items.Name: Explosive Bees
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to all enemies

Items.Name: Giant Potion
Items.Effect: Another invention deals double damage to Large threats this turn

Items.Name: Psycho Android
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to an enemy, if it kills repeat this process
Items.Flavor: Killing you was fun! It's too bad you can't play again.

Items.Name: Giant Mech
Items.Effect: Deal 3 damage to an enemy, doubled if it's a Large enemy

Items.Name: A.T.T.A.C.
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to an enemy, plus 2 if it's robotic

Items.Name: Laser Fighter
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to 2 enemies

Items.Name: Holo Disguise
Items.Effect: Deal 3 damage to a scheme

Items.Name: Holy Light Beam
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to an threat, plus 2 if it's Magical

Items.Name: Magic Harvester
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to an enemy, if it's magical gain 2 [^Magic]

Items.Name: Portal Gun
Items.Effect: One invention can hit one more threat this turn

Items.Name: Gravity Gun
Items.Effect: Target two enemies they deal damage to each other equal to their health

Items.Name: EMP Bomb
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to all Computer threats, doubled against Large threats

Items.Name: Invasive AI
Items.Effect: Deal 3 damage to a scheme, anytime you defeat a scheme deal 1 damage to a different Threat

Items.Name: Anti Magic Field
Items.Effect: Deal 3 damage to all [^Magic] Threats

Items.Name: Engineered Pathogen
Items.Effect: Deal 3 damage to an enemy and any enemy that shares a subtype with that enemy

Items.Name: Ghost Army
Items.Effect: Deal 6 damage to an enemy, if it kills an enemy you may discard one of your threats

Items.Name: Killer Nanite Swarm
Items.Effect: Deal 4 damage to an enemy this has not attacked, if it's Robotic you may repeat this effect

Items.Name: Magic Cannon
Items.Effect: Deal 9 damage divided as you choose, any damage dealt to Large enemies is doubled

Items.Name: Chaos Cannon
Items.Effect: Deal 2d6 damage to an enemy, it's doubled if it's a Large enemy

Items.Name: Flying Castle
Items.Effect: All your other inventions deal 1 more damage to each threat they hit

Items.Name: Immortality Field
Items.Effect: You can't lose Victory Points this turn

Items.Name: Orbital Laser
Items.Effect: Deal 12 damage to an enemy, doubled if it's Large

Items.Name: Continental Nuke
Items.Effect: Lose 3 victory points, deal 5 damage to all enemies, this damage is doubled against Large enemies

Items.Name: Pet Dragon
Items.Effect: Deal 2 damage to all the enemies, and double to Large enemies, any enemy killed this gain an additional Victory Point

Items.Name: Gravity Generator
Items.Effect: The next invention you use that hits an enemy hits all your enemies

Items.Name: Mind Control Device
Items.Effect: Destroy one, non Large, Biological enemy, and deal damage equal to it's health to another Threat

Items.Name: Invisible Airship
Items.Effect: After resolving failure effects you may use all your inventions again

Items.Name: Dimensional Hole Device
Items.Effect: Deal 5 damage to an enemy, it's doubled if they are biological, it's also doubled if they are Large
